mapper.select: select usernum, userid, passwd, email, username, email, hp1 , hp2, hp3, addr1, addr2, user_status, gender, birth, grade from tbl_member A join tbl_member_detail B on A.userid = B.fk_userid where A.user_status = 1

select awardnum , (select fk_userid from tbl_member_detail where usernum = fk_usernum) as userid , (select actname from tbl_auction A join tbl_auction_detail B on A.actnum = B.fk_actnum where B.actdnum = fk_actdnum) as actname , awardday, awardprice , (select deliverstatus from tbl_deliver where fk_awardnum = awardnum) as deliverstatus from tbl_award where award_status = 1

select ep_boardno, fk_userid , (select actname from tbl_auction A join tbl_auction_detail B on A.actnum = B.fk_actnum where B.actdnum = fk_actdnum) as fk_actdnum , ep_content, ep_writeday, ep_satisfaction, ep_boardstatus from tbl_hugiboard
mapper.update: update tbl_hugiboard set ep_boardstatus = 0 where ep_boardno = #{ep_boardno}
update tbl_hugiboard set ep_boardstatus = 1 where ep_boardno = #{ep_boardno}
update tbl_deliver set deliverstatus = #{deliverstatus} where fk_awardnum = #{awardnum}
